text: (mema kāraṇāvan deka notibuṇē nam), allāh ovunva dan̆ḍuvam nokara siṭīmaṭa kumana (bādhāvakda?) mandayat ovun nam, ehi ārakṣakayin vaśayen nosiṭiyadī (janatāva) śuddha vū masjidayaṭa ætuḷu vīma vaḷakavannāha. pariśuddhavantayin misa, vena kisivekut ehi ārakṣakayin vaśayen siṭīmaṭa nohækiya. ehet ovungen væḍi deneku (meya) dæna gannē næta
